name: exp
description: Calculates the exponent whose base is e that represents number. The constant e equals 2.71828182845904, the base of the natural logarithm. This function is the inverse of Log, the natural logarithm of number.

params.name: number
params.description: Exponent to apply to the base e.

examples.title: exponent of 1.13140211149
examples.description: The result could vary depending on if the server is running windows or linux.  On a windows box the result will be round to 3.1
